channel.title: BUpolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUpolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Maine's governor demands data on immigration arrests as fear spreads amid enforcement surge

item.title: Republicans ask Supreme Court to block California's new congressional map
item.description: Republicans rushed to the Supreme Court this week asking the justices to block California's new Democrat-friendly congressional map.

item.title: Texas sheriff, staffer charged with COVID-era fraud scheme
item.description: A Texas sheriff and his assistant chief have been indicted for a scheme to defraud the sheriff's office during the COVID-19 pandemic.

item.title: Americans give Trump low marks on handling of economy as midterms likely to center on affordability
item.description: Sixty-one percent of voters told a CNN poll released Friday that they disapprove of the way Trump is handling the economy.

item.title: Capitol agenda: Trump tests GOP with Fed probe

item.title: Democrats think they’ve found their 2026 message — and Miami just backed it up
item.description: In races across the country, Democrats focused on promises to make life more affordable — even as they offered contrasting approaches.

item.title: Can an App Replace a Personal Trainer? I Tested Nearly a Dozen to Find Out
